column4: hello I have a dualboot laptop ubuntu8.10 and winXP pro.  I would like to boot into ubuntu and run the xp partition as a vm.  is this possible?  it seems only possible to reinstall windows inside the vm :/
I don't believe it's possible to run an existing Windows Installtion inside a virtual machine, but you could try #qemu
there is such thing as uncensored and anyonmous browsing, but perhaps out of the scope of #ubuntu
